Installation¶

Stable release¶

To install Candyshop, run this command in your terminal:

$ pip install candyshop

If you don’t have pip installed, this Python installation guide can guide you through the process.

From sources¶

The sources for Candyshop can be downloaded from the Github repo.

You can either clone the public repository:

$ git clone git://github.com/LuisAlejandro/candyshop

Or download the tarball:

$ curl  -OL https://github.com/LuisAlejandro/candyshop/tarball/master

Once you have a copy of the source, you can install it with:

$ python setup.py install

Candyshop is a helper to determine if all your dependencies are declared properly.
